synopsis.p: Removes grid vectors from a grdmap file using range and/or CPID criteria.

description.p: Removes grid vectors from a grid file.
The task searches for and removes grid vectors that do not meet user-defined slant range or control program ID (CPID) criteria. By default the task will not exclude any data.

example.description: Filter the grd format file "20040830.grd" to produce the file "20040830.grd.f".
